snippet: After beating the Jets and the Cowboys, the Giants open the playoffs against the Falcons and their star quarterback.
abstract: After beating the Jets and the Cowboys, the Giants open the playoffs against the Falcons and their star quarterback.
lead_paragraph: EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. - By the end of the day Sunday, the Giants will have faced a number of notable opponents on their quest for a Super Bowl: the New England Patriots, the San Francisco 49ers, the New Orleans Saints, the Green Bay Packers and three guys named Ryan.

headline.main: Giants Go From Facing Rex Ryan to Rob Ryan to Matt Ryan
